title: MOTOROLA G51 5G (Bright Silver, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, USB Cables, Guides, Sim Tool
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Single SPK Box with Smart PA, Dolby Atmos
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 50 MP (1/2.76 Inch Optical Format, f/1.8 Aperture, 0.64um Pixel Size) + 8 MP Wide/ Depth Camera (f/2.2 Aperture, 1.12um Pixel Size) + 2 MP Macro Camera (f/2.4 Aperture, 1.75um Pixel Size), Camera Feature: Dual Capture, Spot Color, Night Vision, Cinemagraph, Portrait, Cutout, Live Filter, Panorama, Pro, Ultra Res, Burst shot, Smart Composition, Shot Optimization, Auto Smile Capture, Gesture Capture, Time Lapse, Super Resolution, Multi-Frame Bokeh, Assistive Grid, Leveler, Watermark, RAW, Barcode Scanner, Active Photos, HDR, Digital Zoom Upto 8x, Long Exposure, Video Feature: Dual Capture, Spot Color, AR Stickers, Timelapse (W/ Hyperlapse), Slow motion, Video stabilization, Video Snapshot
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 13 MP Camera Setup: ( f/2.2 Aperture, 1.12um Pixel Size), Camera Feature: Dual Capture, Spot Color, Night Vision, Cinemagraph, Portrait, Live Filter, Group Selfie, Pro Mode, Burst Shot, Low Light AI Selfie, Shot Optimization, Auto Smile Capture, Gesture Capture, Selfie Animation, Face Beauty, RAW Photo Output, HDR, Timer, Best Shot, Active Photos, Burst Shot, Assistive Grid, Leveler, Watermark, Live Filter, Video Feature: Shooting modes: Dual Capture, Spot Color, Timelapse (W/ Hyperlapse), Slow Motion, Video Stabilization, Face Beauty, Video Snapshot
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps/60 fps), 720p (at 30 fps), Slow Motion: 1080p (at 240 fps)| Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Notification LED, Proximity, Ambient Light, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Magnetometer (Compass)
product_specification.Other Features: Gradient Unibody ME, 20W Charger, 2 Microphone, Face Unlock, Google Assistant
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, A-GPS, LTEPP, SUPL, GLONASS, GAlILEO
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.5G Bands Support: The Moto g51 mobile phone is compatible with 5G bands so that you can download your favourite movies, videos, and play online games without any lag.
product_description.Snapdragon 480+ 5G Processor: This mobile phone is powered by a Snapdragon 480+ 5G processor that delivers fast graphics performance, thus transforming your gaming experience into a realistic one. Also, the chipset on this mobile phone features high speed CPU and GPU performance with up to 200MHz CPU. As a result, you can enjoy seamless and responsive performance while editing photos, playing games, or multitasking.
product_description.ThinkShield Security: This mobile phone features ThinkShield business-grade security for mobile so that you can keep your data secure from malware, phishing, and other external threats.
product_description.Seamless and Vibrant Display: Moto g51 5G is equipped with a 17.5 cm (6.8) Full HD display so that you can enjoy streaming your favourite movies, TV shows, and games in a way that brings entertainment to life. The mobile also features a 120Hz refresh rate, so that you seamlessly shuffle between multiple apps without any lag. And, thanks to the 240Hz touch sampling rate, you can enjoy smooth gaming.
product_description.Stunning Photos: This mobile phone comes with a 50 MP main camera so that you can capture your favourite moments or shots under any lighting condition and from any angle. Also, this mobile phone features a Quad Pixel technology with low-light sensitivity that allows you to take sharp and vibrant pictures at all times. And, thanks to the 8 MP ultrawide and depth sensor as well as the macro vision camera, you can capture professional looking photos along with detailed close-ups.
product_description.Power-efficient Battery: No matter whether you are travelling or attending an office meeting, you don't have to worry about your battery running out, as this mobile phone runs on a 5000 mAh battery. As a result, you can enjoy up to 30 hours of uninterrupted battery life in a single full charge. Also, this mobile phone comes with a 20 W rapid charging feature, so that you can charge your phone in jiffy when your battery runs down.
product_description.Near-stock Android 11: You can enjoy the simple UI that’s free of bloatware and ads, thanks to the Near-stock Android 11 feature that allows you to avail powerful device controls. Also, you get access to the Android 12 update and 2 years of security updates. So, you can control your privacy settings, conversations, and more.
product_description.IP52 Water-repellent Design: This mobile phone comes with water repellent design so that you can enjoy worry-free protection against drops, shocks, spills, and splashes.
product_description.Classy Design: This smartphone features a clean and modern look, to deliver an aesthetic look to the phone.

review:
Let me tell you in details...
Camera- good camera 9/10
Battery- okay 8/10
Charging time- 0to95 in 1.3hrs
Processor- sd 480+
Antutu score- 240000+
Display is good.
According to me...Antutu score- should have been better at this price....other mobiles have Antutu score- more than 3lakhs at this price range.
I would have been happy if Antutu score was more than 2.8lakhs.

I am writing this review after using 2 days

1. 2.2GB out of 4GB RAM is used by the OS and some pre-installed applications. So available RAM to the user is 1.8 GB.
2. 24 GB out of 64GB storage RAM is used by the system and some pre-installed applications. So available storage RAM to the user is 40GB.
3. 1GB RAM boost option is available under setting >> system >> performance
4. Comes with NEG glass protection (Japanese Technology) equivalent to gorilla glass 3.
5. Speaker is louder.
6. Dolby Atmos is good.
7. Rear camera quality is decent.
8. Front camera quality is average.
9. Display refresh rate can be fixed to 60 or 120 Hz or can be set as Auto select.
10. Brightness of the display could be better for reading under outdoor sunlight.
11. Battery backup could have been better with a super AMOLED display.
12. A 20 watt charger charges the battery from 10 to 100% in 1.5hours.

Great Value For Money phone.
I have 2 Mi flagships launched this year as my daily driver. But could not resist buying this for the price. Moto did not disappoint.
The camera in daylight produces bright images ready for social media. You can reduce the warm tone in post if you like a cooler vibe. Even the wide angle is very good and produces better images than all 8mp snappers till 30K. Definitely better than my Mi 11x which I use as a secondary phone. I used latest gCam mod and found the moto stock cam to be better in 70 percent scenario.
Display is good enough for the price. There is no stutters in UI as the processor is good enough. Moto even gives 1gb expansion for 4gb ram.
Battery easily lasts a day with heavy use. Moto guestures are very convenient. The UI is clean and no boloatware, so very light on the resource.
People complaining about low internal space is true. However, I think, thinkshield security and Moto softwares (which are very good once you use it) takes up that space. In my opinion hybrid sim slot could be a deal breaker for some. Atleast I wished there could be a dedicated card slot. There is also no option for you to use external memory card as internal. So you can't move your apps. Although, you can move your images and videos etc.
Verdict: Go for it. It is definitely better than 4g phones like G40 and other 5g phones available in its price range

Excellent camera with different pixel density modes, clean OS with useful UI and gesture customisations, solid build quality, long lasting battery, nice back cover, does not feel heavy due to good weight distribution, has good in hand feel, 20W charger supports fast charging.

Don't Hesitate, just go for it.
I always buy any product with lots of reserch so trust me, moto g51 5g worth every penny. Within tight 15k budget phones there are lots of phone but i can say moto g51 is best buy. I have been using this phone since last 2 weeks so let me share some pros and cons.

Pros-
1. Future proof 5g with 12 band support so you don't have to worry when 5g will come to india, its a long road but its a good thing to be future proof.
2. Amazing near stock android experience...
READ MORE

Review after 1 week of use :

Pros:
*Build quality is absolutely one of the best in this category (after using multiple smartphones of other brands)
*Looks much attractive & eye-soothing in reality, compared to that in pictures
*Camera quality is really great. Moto didn't comprise a single bit in quality. Portrait mode is mostly perfect & well composite with its AI processing. Colours stands out really attractive. Details are very well preserved even in ultra wide lens. Primary lens is wide, which makes it really useful in tight areas framing. Front camera is very well sorted and detailed.
*Moto phones have really nice displays. With 120Hz , the display is the BEST YOU CAN GET IN THIS PRICE SEGMENT. Trust me I mean it (even compared to phones with budget amoled displays). Moto IS THE ONLY BRAND WHO ALWAYS DID & STILL PROVIDES glance display for quickly checking out time, notification even in LCD display.
*The stock android experience is the smoothest compared to all bloatware loaded UIs for other brands.
*Being the biggest phone (6.8" display + 5000mah battery), still weighs significantly average.
*With Dolby Atmos sound is great with earphones plugged in.

Cons:
#No memory expansion & no more storage options models
#Display maximum brightness is a little less in bright sunlight. Could have been a bit more.
#Fast charging >20 watt should have been a feature.

Pros :
1. Daylight camera is good. Front camera is also good. Also You can install G Cam in moto Phones, I request all of you to install G Cam on this phone.
2. UI is good and no major lags.
3. Performance is surprisingly good. BGMI( Smooth + ultra with gyroscope runs without lags.)
4. Display 120hz refresh rate handles good.
5. Battery is good with auto refresh rate.

Cons :
1. No option to change video resolution ( even can't see in which resolution I am shooting the video ).
2. Very bad camera UI. It's sometime lags.
3. Hybrid slot with 64 Gb storage is very less for storing apps also there is no option to transfer app data to SD card like One UI.
4. Display Quality is average.

Nice phone. Good performance.. It does it's duty under 15k specifications. Camera quality is acceptable. Height is little bit long.. 33w charger is best for this phone for fast charging.. Battery backup is good..Otherwise this phone is amazing. Worth for 15k.

Phone is 208 gm but the grip is solid in single hand, due to 120hz display rate and processor screen performance is very good but camera need improvement (if the phone size is 6.4 inch and charger may 33watt then oh hoy hoy.।)

Good performance and huge battery 🔋
Nice camera
Better display
Big and vibrant processor
Tough made
Over all super excited deal in this price range ❤️

Pros:
12 5G Bands.
Super fast and ultra smooth display. 120Hz Refresh Rate.
Very smooth touch and interactive experience.
Excellent camera quality and powerful features.
Brilliant performance, no lags/glitches or frame drops.
Stock Android. No bloatware.
Terrific connectivity. Faster 4G experience.
Good battery backup and optimisation. 20W in box Type-C charger.
Many useful additional features like peek display, attentive display, power touch, etc.
3.5 mm audio jack.
2 Years of guaranteed updates.
Cons:
Hybrid sim tray.
Not available in many colours.
Single speaker (dual stereo not available). But the audio is clear and loud. Dolby Atmos also included. Not particularly a con but could have been better.

I took this phone to use it as a portable hotspot. It has 4x4 mimo along with 5g but not sure which all bands support it.To lock band 4636 secret code can be used.i am able to lock 4g band without rooting.i am happy with it.
Hotspot with 2.4ghz is only showing max speed as 83mbps...which is something not expected.

Pros:
120hz and 60hz options give a very smooth experience.
Camera is alright in day.
Screen size is big and gaming and movies are fun to watch.
Battery easily lasts one day even with 2-3 hrs of pubg.
Battery charges up quickly (1-1.5 hrs).
Near stock Android experience with 2 years of

Cons
Screen is too big to be handled by one hand.
Gaming is ok but not for professionals.
While changing themes, you can feel the phone stutter.
5g is no use as of now.
You can only use 2 sim cards or one sim plus memory card.

Value for money if you are willing to ignore the last mentioned con.

I just have the worst network problem with this. I was using a Xiaomi phone before this and my internet was fine with Jio 4G but with this, it is just worst. It's like I am on a 2G network and it is a 5G phone. A 5G phone which can't even run 4G, which is running 4G worse than my old Xiaomi 4G phone. I have to shift rooms, go to terrace just to get network. Don't know why this is happening. (1)

Also you get 20W charger in the box, atleast 30W charger should be there. Also battery is draining faster than usual. (2)

Camera performance is also just average, night performance is worse and night mode is just worst. I think it shouldn't have this night mode because no one is going to use it. If you use it, you will know why. (3)
